question:
The World Bank was established due to which of the following reasons?
1) To promote the International Trade
2) To reconstruct the economies damaged during the Second World War
3) To improve the adverse Balance of Payment situation of the nonmember countries
Select the correct answer from the codes given below?
explanation: World war II gave a big blow to the economies of different countries. The prime motive behind the establishment of the World Bank was to provide long-run capital to member countries for economic reconstruction and development.
